channel.title: Boolean to make a tab open? help please
channel.description:
hi, i can make a boolean to make it so that you need to do a quest to get to use a certain spell/item such but how can i make it so that you need the boolean to be true to click the magic tab (ancients) because i have lunar spells (wrong gfx's but the icons) on my client and i want it so you need to do a quest to be able to unlock them
thanks
